content: When the cutscene is over, you'll be at the edge of the cliff, so hop on to Somersault Cloud to get started exploring the area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Supreme Inspector'.
The content is as follows:
When the cutscene is over, you'll be at the edge of the cliff, so hop on to Somersault Cloud to get started exploring the area.
